snippet: Mr. Kliegerman, 44, is the president of Terra Development Marketing, overseeing sales and marketing of new developments for Halstead Property and Brown Harris Stevens.
abstract: Vivian Marino 30-Minute Interview with Stephen G Kliegerman, president of Terra Development Marketing, overseeing sales and marketing of new developments for Halstead Property and Brown Harris Stevens Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kliegerman, 44, is the president of Terra Development Marketing, overseeing sales and marketing of new developments for Halstead Property and Brown Harris Stevens, both owned by Terra Holdings. The New York developments include the condominiums One48 in Gramercy Park and Richard Meier On Prospect Park in Brooklyn, and the Chelsea rental 537 West 27th Street. Interview conducted and condensed by
